name: Abyss (itch) (Puppets Studios)
description:
Abyss is a game in the category "Tower Defense" in which you must protect your kingdom from being invaded and try to survive through all the waves (currently there are 41).

Enemies will dodge your warriors to go directly to your gate. With that in mind, strategize and strategize in real time to protect your kingdom.

If defeat is inevitable and the opposing race proves to be superior, then your current reign will fall! Defeat in this game is not the end, but a CHANGE of reign. Survive as long as possible and discover the powers of all races!

ps: The game at the time of publication was made with Game Jam in mind, but possibly there will be more updates to integrate more content.

Produced by:
